amendment.description: An amendment numbered 43 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to eliminate funding for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program and moves this funding to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce the account for the Advanced Technology Vehicles Manufacturing Loan Program by $18 million and apply the savings to the Spending Reduction Account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 267 (Roll no. 365).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A019) Failed by recorded vote: 147 - 267 (Roll no. 365).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
